aboutMeText: Hi! I'm Oleander. I'm a {age} year old student at the Norwegian University of Science and Technology (NTNU) in Trondheim, where I study computer engineering. I have a passion for programming and technology, and I love learning new things and challenging myself. In my free time, I enjoy working on personal projects, exploring new technologies, and spending time with friends and family.
aboutTheSiteText: This website is built using Vue.js, a popular JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. It also uses Tailwind CSS for styling and i18n for internationalization. The source code for this website is available on GitHub, so feel free to check it out and see how it works!
whatTheSiteIsForText: The main purpose of this website is to serve as a portfolio for my projects and to provide a way for people to get in touch with me. I also wanted to create a platform where I can share my thoughts and ideas about programming and technology, and where I can connect with other like-minded individuals.
projectsText: Here are some of my projects. Click on each project to learn more about it.
contactText: If you'd like to get in touch with me, you can send me an email at {} or find me on social media by clicking the icons below.
